Heroes_Villains.minigames.MiniGame

    • Uses of MiniGame in Heroes_Villains.minigames

      Subclasses of MiniGame in Heroes_Villains.minigames 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DiceRoll
      Class for the dice roll game, player rolls and villains rolls, highest roll wins
      class  GuessTheNumber
      Class for the guess the number minigame, player can pick a number, and will then be told whether their guess was too high or too low, and has a final guess
      class  PaperScissorsRock
      Class for the PaperScissorsRock mini game that gets played in the battle state of the game
      Fields in Heroes_Villains.minigames declared as MiniGame

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MiniGame MiniGameHandler.getCurrentGame(int cityNum)
      Method for returing the currently played minigame in a city
      MiniGame MiniGameHandler.getGame()
      Method that returns a random new minigame, either guess the number, paper scissors rock, or dice roll
